definition: don't tell me .../could it be that...?
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Do not you just let me look at this hole in it?
sentences.chinese: 難道你就是讓我看這個小洞洞嗎？

sentences.english: Have you only remembered Dong Ying and Tong?
sentences.chinese: 難道你只記得董穎和彤了嗎？

sentences.english: Don't you ever get bored waiting in traffic?
sentences.chinese: 在車陣中等候你難道不會嫌煩嗎？

sentences.english: And shall we crouch above these graves.
sentences.chinese: 難道我們理應蜷伏在他們的墓穴上。

sentences.english: And then all this earthquake happened, I thought, is that Karma?-when you are not nice that bad things happen to you.
sentences.chinese: 然後地震發生了，我當時就想，這難道是因果報應？

sentences.english: Do investors not like the company?
sentences.chinese: 難道投資者看不上這家公司？

sentences.english: Can they not see the madness that lies within the Witch King?
sentences.chinese: 他們難道看不到巫王的瘋狂？

sentences.english: She had been sitting on them for a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 難道長得醜是一種罪嗎？

sentences.english: Maybe the intelligent person ain't so smart after all?
sentences.chinese: 可能，難道這個有才智的人並不聰明？

sentences.english: You have other plans on a Wednesday afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 難道你星期三下午還有其他安排嗎？

sentences.english: Don't be loaded , let everybody thought that you have more pitiful?
sentences.chinese: 難道是裝的，讓大家以爲你有多可憐？

sentences.english: Those early years' folding Ru old grudge have already eliminated thin?
sentences.chinese: 難道當年的折辱仇恨已經消淡了？

sentences.english: Can you not understand that liberty is worth more than ribbons?
sentences.chinese: 你難道不明白自由比綬帶更有價值嗎？

sentences.english: Could this be the burial shroud of Jesus Christ?
sentences.chinese: 這難道就是耶穌的裹屍布？

sentences.english: Oughtn’t you to give us a chance to try ?
sentences.chinese: 你難道不應該給我們一個嘗試的機會嗎？
難道一切都毫無疑問地喪失殆盡了嗎？

definition: why?/for what reason?
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
why
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
(question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
surname Huan
to pay back/to return
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
actually/in fact/really
